Beaver Blog

    Managing Excerpt

    You can customise the excerpt (the text displayed below each post on the homepage) using the excerpt-separator.

    Daniele Rolli

    June 13, 2024 • 1 min read

    You can customise the excerpt (the text displayed below each post on the homepage) using the excerpt-separator. Here’s how you can do so!

    Steps

    1. Add excerpt_separator: <!--more--> to the frontmatter of your blog post.

    2. Insert this <!--more--> at where you would like the excerpt to cut off in your blog post.

    Note

    This follows Jekyll’s recommended way of managing excerpts.

    Example

    See this post
